overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across multiple social media platforms, with a total follower count of 3,580. Engagement varies per platform, with LinkedIn showing the highest engagement rates. The content focuses on research updates, academic opportunities, and discussions around disinformation and computational methods.

contentThemes.description: Updates about new research papers, projects, and academic contributions.
Information about job openings and research opportunities in the field of computational social science.
Discussions and presentations about methodological approaches to studying disinformation and coordinated campaigns.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts related to new research findings and academic opportunities to leverage high engagement.
Engage more with followers through comments and discussions to improve interaction, especially on platforms like Mastodon and Bluesky.
